code: import React from"react";import"../../../../Styles/Style.css";var TVFunctions=function TVFunctions(event,apikey){//storing the event var searchField=event.target.value;// storing the URL for searching movies var tvSearch="https://api.themoviedb.org/3/search/tv?api_key="+apikey+"&language=en-US&query="+searchField+"&page=1&include_adult=false";// creating my promise var promise=new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var catchData=fetch(tvSearch);resolve(catchData);});// converting the data to json data promise.then(function(response){return response.json();})//converting the data to a object .then(function(data){console.log(data);// grabbed the div tag from the Movie.js var tvDiv=document.getElementById("tvDiv");tvDiv.innerHTML="";// movieDiv.innerHTML="" // create p tag for movie over view var tvOverView=document.createElement("p");tvOverView.innerHTML="";// create p tag for movie title var tvTilte=document.createElement("p");tvTilte.innerHTML="";var tvImage=document.createElement("img");var tvReleaseDate=document.createElement("p");// filter through the list of objects var filtereTVData=data.results.filter(function(tv){return tv.name===searchField;});// printing off the list of objects filtereTVData.forEach(function(tv){tvImage.setAttribute("src","https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w300/"+tv.poster_path);tvImage.setAttribute("alt","Sorry, there are problems with the image");tvTilte.innerHTML="Title: "+tv.name;tvOverView.innerHTML="Movie Overview: "+tv.overview;tvReleaseDate.innerHTML=" Released: "+tv.first_air_date+"";tvDiv.appendChild(tvTilte);tvDiv.appendChild(tvOverView);tvDiv.appendChild(tvImage);tvDiv.appendChild(tvReleaseDate);console.log(tvTilte);console.log(tvOverView);new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var actorData=fetch("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/tv/"+tv.id+"/credits?api_key="+apikey);resolve(actorData);}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(data){data.cast.forEach(function(data){var actorP=document.createElement("p");var actorRole=document.createElement("p");var actorPicture=document.createElement("img");var actorDiv=document.createElement("div");actorDiv.setAttribute("class","actorCard");actorPicture.setAttribute("src","https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w300/"+data.profile_path);actorRole.innerHTML="Role: "+data.character;actorP.innerHTML="Crew: "+data.name;tvDiv.setAttribute("class","cardBody");tvDiv.appendChild(actorDiv);actorDiv.appendChild(actorP);actorDiv.appendChild(actorRole);actorDiv.appendChild(actorPicture);console.log(data);});});});});};export default TVFunctions;
